name: Color Wave (Northdeste)
description:
Imagine being trapped in a room, in need to defend yourself from a lot of monsters, only being capable to attack them with...paint? 
 That's right. Your life depends on paint. And it seems to work! Somehow, the monsters explode in contact with it! Now you need to use your ammo wisely, otherwise, you won't make it alive!

CITY 

Aracaju-Brazil

GAME DESIGN

 Caio Correia, Gabriel Lima, Gabrielle Prado, Luan Nícolas

ARTISTS

Emmanuel Victor, Gabriel Arciere, Gabriel Lima, Ivna Maria, Raul Yoshio, Thiago Maxwell

SOUND DESIGN/COMPOSING

André Rente Machado Silva

PROGRAMMING

Luiz Felipe, Tácito Rodrigues, John Victor Dantas Costa
